TopicTitle: First post; My rockets fall apart before or after staging

Articles.Content: So I have tried auto struts & just ridged attached. I like using tweet scale trying to get the lowest weight tank for what Im trying to do. The camera will wobble or a puff of smoke will appear during an otherwise uneventful launch. If its the main body of the rocket the engines will stay on without control or if not half of the rocket body will fall away. This has been driving me nuts. I took a screen shot of the event log right when it happened. Is there a sure fire way to stop this or do I have to uninstall mods? What mod could be causing it. I dont even remember most of the ones I have. I also took a screen shot of my "Game Data" plox halp https://imgur.com/1Fqcxlg  https://imgur.com/a/9onjwzz
can you put up the craft file or images of your rocket

On 1/1/2021 at 1:06 AM, barry_soetoro said:

So I have tried auto struts & just ridged attached

Do not use Rigit Attachment, it makes things break more easily.

Use Grandparent autostruts in ALL parts, not just one, and maybe one or two heavy.
